mapper.select: select (CASE r.status WHEN '0' then r.dangers else 0 end) as rectifications, (CASE r.status WHEN '1' then r.dangers else 0 end) as reexaminations, (CASE r.status WHEN '2' then r.dangers else 0 end) as finishs, (select count(1) from owner_unit_danger t where t.unit_id = o.id ) as dangers from owner_unit o left join (select ud.unit_id, ud.status, count(1) as dangers from owner_unit_danger ud group by ud.unit_id, ud.status) r on r.unit_id = o.id where o.id = #{unitId} limit 1
